text: Lövgrens is a dansband from Billesholm in Sweden. The band was established in 1994. In the early 2010s, the band has scored album chart successes in Sweden. The band was called Claes Lövgrens until July 2017. It was named after singer Claes Lövgren. The band's drummer Johan Fredriksson was awarded the "drummer of the year" in 2007. Lövgrens has played together since 1994. Since new-year 2002-2003, the band is a full-time band, touring all over Sweden ==Discography== ===Albums=== *Rosor från himlen - 2001 *Dansvänliga låtar - 2005 *Dansvänliga låtar 2 - 2008 *Vi lever nu - 2010 *Bästa - 2013 *Vi börjar igen! - 2014 == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Dansbands Category:Musical groups established in 1994 Category:Swedish musical groups
title: Lövgrens
